subhead: Sponsors & Supporters of the 2019 International Blockchain Olympaid

sponsors.name: Cardano
sponsors.description: Cardano is a decentralised public blockchain and cryptocurrency project and is fully open source. Cardano is developing a smart contract platform which seeks to deliver more advanced features than any protocol previously developed.

sponsors.name: Emurgo
sponsors.description: EMURGO was founded in 2017 and is a registered company in Japan. We develop, support, and incubate commercial ventures and help integrate these businesses into Cardanoâ€™s decentralized blockchain ecosystem. Cardano seeks to power the financial stack for the developing world, and EMURGO's mission is to help these economies emerge through blockchain technology

sponsors.name: eMALI
sponsors.description: eMALI is an enterprise blockchain developer working on applications in the Fin/Insur/RegTech sectors specializing on identity management, trade and supply chain finance, insurance claim management, fraud detection and regulatory registries.

supportingOrganisations.name: HKBCS
supportingOrganisations.description: The Hong Kong Blockchain Society promotes sustainable and mature of the blockchain ecosystem. HKBCS encourages and supports projects that are legal and compliant in Hong Kong and the surrounding region.

supportingOrganisations.name: Blockchain Education Network
supportingOrganisations.description: Blockchain Education Network is made up of students and alumni across the world who are creating bitcoin and blockchain clubs on their academic campuses. By exploring this socioeconomic experiment within the safety of their peers, students build new expectations and innovations.

prompt: If your organisation is interested in supporting the International Blockchain Olympiad, please contact sponsors@ibcol.org
